title: Houston Astros Win World Series
description: Dogged by criticism that they could not win without sign-stealing, Houston beat the Philadelphia Phillies in six games to complete a truly dominant postseason.
dc:creator: David Waldstein
media:credit: Annie Mulligan for The New York Times
media:description: The Astros were able to celebrate their World Series victory in front of their home fans at Minute Maid Park in Houston on Saturday.
